transArray.content: Everything else is good, but the TV is a bit old. Very grainy. For more than four hundred yuan a night, TV shouldnâ€™t be like this, right?

Dear guest, first of all, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition. Your support is the greatest encouragement to our work. Although the hotel TV is not a new model, it does not affect viewing under normal circumstances. Thank you for your feedback. We will arrange for engineers to conduct inspection and maintenance as soon as possible. If it is convenient for you, we also hope that you can inform us of the room number you are staying in. If you have any questions about the room during your stay, you can contact our front desk staff at any time. We We will be by your side 24 hours a day, thank you for your support, and wish you all the best!
